info.name: Poliigon Dark Mode (Custom Accent Colors)
info.description:
Poliigon Dark Mode - Pitch Black

Use "Customize Settings" to choose your accent color. Do not recommend setting it to White/Black.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1 - Fixed "slick dots" and themed a bunch more of stuff related to having an account
